resources.string: \"Please turn on location service for Mutify to work properly. \"
Mutify needs to access your location in the background in order to work properly. Please allow access to location all the time.
Mutify needs to access your location in the background, please allow access location all the time.

Mutify will trigger as soon as you enter the area. Choose Dwelling to avoid notification spam. \nPlease be noted that even if you choose Entering, there may still be a delay due to the way the Android system handles Geofencing transitions. \nNew options will be added in a future update.
Mutify will trigger when the Android system detects that you have stayed in the area for a short while. You can set up the delay below:

Mutify needs to access your location information in order to determine whether or not you are in a do-not-disturb area. Please allow access to location all the time. \nMutify will be able to collect your location information, and access your device\u0027s do-not-disturb settings.
